directions: In a small bowl whisk together sour cream, sugar, vanilla, and 1 tablespoon molasses until smooth. Divide strawberries between 2 bowls and top with sour cream sauce. Drizzle remaining molasses over servings.
ingredients: 1 pint strawberries, hulled and, if large, halved
title: Strawberries with Molasses Sour Cream Sauce
